attributes.action: Stop jihadi brides returning to the UK
attributes.additional_details:
There have been recent reports that JIHADI brides who are suspected of forming Britain’s largest all-female terror cell in Syria alongside their ISIS husbands are to return to the UK with their children.
People in our country have been devasted by terrorist attacts.
Women were initially not to be high-risk which studies have now proved is incorrect. Please sign this petition to make our leaders reconsider allowing these people back into the UK.
attributes.background: These women chose to leave the UK and should not be allowed to return. Their aim was to kill the "non-believers" so should not now be permitted to live amongst us in the UK.
